effects.name: Crippling Poison
effects.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, slowing their movement speed by 70% for 12 seconds.

effects.name: Mind-numbing Poision
effects.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 20% chance of poisoning the enemy, increasing their casting time by 60% for 14 seconds.

effects.name: Wound Poision
effects.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, causing 53 Nature damage and reducing all healing effects used on them by 10% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times on a single target.
